forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 3 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere offers a rare and delightful clarity, marked by a gentle embrace of sunlight and soft breezes. As the afternoon progresses, you can expect the temperature to hover around a comfortable 66 degrees, gradually settling to the lower 60s—a fitting invitation for an afternoon spent outdoors. The westward winds, brisk yet playful at 12 to 16 mph, may prompt those wandering along the waterfront to keep a light layer close at hand. While the forecast hints at a sprinkle of clouds later, a blanket of fog does not seem to encroach upon the skyline today; the Golden Gate stands proud against the blue expanse, revealing the city's charm in its full array.

For those contemplating how to best navigate the rest of the day, consider layering a lightweight sweater or jacket over a casual shirt—versatile enough for a stroll through the vibrant streets or a leisurely escape to one of the nearby parks. Perhaps a visit to a local café is in order, where one might savor the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee, absorbing the serene pace of the day while nibbling on a flaky pastry. As evening approaches, the atmosphere will warm into a pleasantly cool night, perfect for lingering conversations under the stars, as the city transitions effortlessly from day to night.
